name: Lloyd Bridges
summary: Lloyd Bridges. Actor: Hot Shots! Part Deux. The star of many land and underwater adventures, Lloyd Vernet Bridges, Jr. was born on January 15, 1913 in San Leandro, California, to Harriet Evelyn (Brown) and Lloyd Vernet Bridges, Sr., who owned a movie theater and also worked in the hotel business. He grew up in various Northern California towns. His father wanted him to become a lawyer, but young Lloyd's interests...
awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys | 2 wins & 4 nominations total
